Name: Proscovia
description:
Proscovia is a repeat borrower with UGAFODE Microfinance. She is married and a resident of Nyabicerere, Ishaka district. She has three kids; only two are school-going.

She is a qualified primary teacher, making her a salary earner, and is also a farmer â€” mainly in banana growing and selling. She supplies these bananas to the nearby local market and neighboring districts. She is a resourceful lady in the society in the way that she employs community members for casual labor.

She is, however, financially constrained because she is no longer earning a salary since schools were closed due to the pandemic, and her farm needs to be restructured.

For this reason she is seeking a loan to buy fertilizers, manure, mulches and banana stems for replanting to increase her production levels.

She believes that with these funds, she will be able to regain her financial status. Thank you, funders.
